results.title: PGC-1alpha-Targeted Therapeutic Approaches to Enhance Muscle Recovery in Aging
results.journal: Int J Environ Res Public Health
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ combined therapies have not been studied in the context of @<m>DISEASE_Muscular_Disorders_Atrophic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020966 @@@muscle disuse atrophy@@@ or recovery in aging.

citations.NLM: Petrocelli JJ, Drummond MJ. PGC-1alpha-Targeted Therapeutic Approaches to Enhance Muscle Recovery in Aging Int J Environ Res Public Health. 2020 Nov 21;17(22):. PMID: 33233350

results.title: Metformin and leucine increase satellite cells and collagen remodeling during disuse and recovery in aged muscle.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Leucine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007930 @@@leucine@@@ increase satellite cells and collagen remodeling during @<m>DISEASE_Muscular_Disorders_Atrophic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020966 @@@disuse@@@ and recovery in aged @DISEASE_Muscle_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D019042 @@@muscle@@@.

citations.NLM: Petrocelli JJ, Mahmassani ZS, Fix DK, Montgomery JA, Reidy PT, McKenzie AI, de Hart NM, Ferrara PJ, Kelley JJ, Eshima H, Funai K, Drummond MJ. Metformin and leucine increase satellite cells and collagen remodeling during disuse and recovery in aged muscle. FASEB J. 2021 Sep;35(9):e21862. PMID: 34416035
citations.BibTeX: @article{34416035, title={Metformin and leucine increase satellite cells and collagen remodeling during disuse and recovery in aged muscle.}, author={Petrocelli JJ and Mahmassani ZS and Fix DK and Montgomery JA and Reidy PT and McKenzie AI and de Hart NM and Ferrara PJ and Kelley JJ and Eshima H and Funai K and Drummond MJ}, journal={FASEB J}, volume={35}, number={9}, pages={e21862}}

results.title: Metformin Pre-Treatment as a Means of Mitigating Disuse-Induced Rat Soleus Muscle Wasting
results.text_hl: Thus, pre-treatment of @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can ameliorate @<m>DISEASE_Muscular_Disorders_Atrophic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020966 @@@disuse@@@-induced reductions in soleus muscle weight, the diameter of slow-type fibers, and absolute muscle strength.

citations.NLM: Mirzoev TM, Paramonova II, Rozhkov SV, Kalashnikova EP, Belova SP, Tyganov SA, Vilchinskaya NA, Shenkman BS. Metformin Pre-Treatment as a Means of Mitigating Disuse-Induced Rat Soleus Muscle Wasting Curr Issues Mol Biol. 2023 Apr 4;45(4):3068-3086. PMID: 37185725
citations.BibTeX: @article{37185725, title={Metformin Pre-Treatment as a Means of Mitigating Disuse-Induced Rat Soleus Muscle Wasting}, author={Mirzoev TM and Paramonova II and Rozhkov SV and Kalashnikova EP and Belova SP and Tyganov SA and Vilchinskaya NA and Shenkman BS}, journal={Curr Issues Mol Biol}, volume={45}, number={4}, pages={3068-3086}}

results.title: Metformin increases the expression of proinflammatory cytokines and inhibits supraspinatus fatty infiltration
results.text_hl: After a @DISEASE_Rotator_Cuff_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D000070636 @@@rotator cuff (RC) tendon tear@@@, the supraspinatus (SS) @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ response induces @DISEASE_Leukemic_Infiltration @DISEASE_MESH:D017254 @@@fatty infiltration@@@ (@DISEASE_Leukemic_Infiltration @DISEASE_MESH:D017254 @@@FI@@@). @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ has the effect of regulating the initial @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ response of @<m>DISEASE_Muscular_Disorders_Atrophic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020966 @@@atrophic muscles@@@.

citations.NLM: Yoon JP, Park SJ, Kim DH, Chung SW. Metformin increases the expression of proinflammatory cytokines and inhibits supraspinatus fatty infiltration J Orthop Surg Res. 2023 Sep 12;18(1):674. PMID: 37700364
citations.BibTeX: @article{37700364, title={Metformin increases the expression of proinflammatory cytokines and inhibits supraspinatus fatty infiltration}, author={Yoon JP and Park SJ and Kim DH and Chung SW}, journal={J Orthop Surg Res}, volume={18}, number={1}, pages={674}}

results.title: Metformin Attenuates Slow-to-Fast Fiber Shift and Proteolysis Markers Increase in Rat Soleus after 7 Days of Rat Hindlimb Unloading
results.text_hl: Thus, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment during @<m>DISEASE_Muscular_Disorders_Atrophic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020966 @@@muscle disuse@@@ could be useful to prevent the decrease in the percentage of slow-type @DISEASE_Fatigue @DISEASE_MESH:D005221 @@@fatigue@@@-resistant muscle fibers.

citations.NLM: Sharlo KA, Lvova ID, Belova SP, Zaripova KA, Shenkman BS, Nemirovskaya TL. Metformin Attenuates Slow-to-Fast Fiber Shift and Proteolysis Markers Increase in Rat Soleus after 7 Days of Rat Hindlimb Unloading Int J Mol Sci. 2022 Dec 28;24(1):. PMID: 36613942
citations.BibTeX: @article{36613942, title={Metformin Attenuates Slow-to-Fast Fiber Shift and Proteolysis Markers Increase in Rat Soleus after 7 Days of Rat Hindlimb Unloading}, author={Sharlo KA and Lvova ID and Belova SP and Zaripova KA and Shenkman BS and Nemirovskaya TL}, journal={Int J Mol Sci}, volume={24}, number={1}}

results.title: Cellular senescence and disrupted proteostasis induced by myotube atrophy are prevented with low-dose metformin and leucine cocktail
results.text_hl: Previously, we found that a @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ + @CHEMICAL_Leucine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007930 @@@leucine@@@ (@GENE_SLTM @GENE_79811 @@@MET@@@+@CHEMICAL_Leucine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007930 @@@LEU@@@) treatment had synergistic effects in aged @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ to improve skeletal muscle structure and function during @<m>DISEASE_Muscular_Disorders_Atrophic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020966 @@@disuse atrophy@@@.

citations.NLM: Petrocelli JJ, de Hart NMMP, Lang MJ, Yee EM, Ferrara PJ, Fix DK, Chaix A, Funai K, Drummond MJ. Cellular senescence and disrupted proteostasis induced by myotube atrophy are prevented with low-dose metformin and leucine cocktail Aging (Albany NY). 2023 Mar 20;15(6):1808-1832. PMID: 36947713
citations.BibTeX: @article{36947713, title={Cellular senescence and disrupted proteostasis induced by myotube atrophy are prevented with low-dose metformin and leucine cocktail}, author={Petrocelli JJ and de Hart NMMP and Lang MJ and Yee EM and Ferrara PJ and Fix DK and Chaix A and Funai K and Drummond MJ}, journal={Aging (Albany NY)}, volume={15}, number={6}, pages={1808-1832}}
